featuresSection.heading: Explore Diverse Rental House Options Available in Sector 67 Gurgaon Today
description: Sector 67 caters to a wide spectrum of housing needs, ensuring that whether you are a nuclear family seeking a compact independent floor or an extended family needing a spacious villa, you will find suitable options here. The inventory of houses for rent in Sector 67 Gurgaon includes beautifully constructed builder floors, luxury independent houses, and secure society homes. Each option provides unique benefits relating to privacy, space, and access to amenities, allowing tenants to select a residence that truly matches their lifestyle requirements. We focus on listing properties that adhere to high standards of construction and maintenance, guaranteeing a stress-free living experience.

Understanding the specific needs of renters is our priority, which is why our listings are meticulously categorized. You can easily filter searches based on furnished status, proximity to specific landmarks, or access to private parking and gardens. Renting a house in Sector 67 means choosing a life of convenience and quality. Many properties boast modern modular kitchens, premium fittings, and round-the-clock security. Let us guide you through the process of securing a premium rental home in this thriving area of Gurgaon, ensuring maximum value for your rental investment.

features.title: Independent Builder Floors
features.description: Ideal for nuclear families seeking privacy without the full maintenance commitment of a villa. These floors typically offer spacious 2 BHK or 3 BHK layouts with separate entry and exit points. Rent house in Sector 67 builder floors often means accessing better light and ventilation compared to apartments. They are generally situated on smaller plots but offer excellent internal customization and ample space for contemporary living.

features.title: Spacious 3 BHK Independent Houses
features.description: A highly popular choice for those needing more room, these independent homes provide a blend of space and comfort. These rental houses usually include a dedicated servant room, larger balconies, and sometimes a small private garden area. Look to rent house in Sector 67 independent setups for better control over utilities and usage, often found in well-planned residential pockets of the sector, perfect for long-term family settlement.

features.title: Luxury 4 BHK Villas and Kothis
features.description: For renters who prioritize expansive living spaces and top-tier luxury amenities, the 4 BHK and larger kothis are the ultimate choice. These rental properties in Sector 67 frequently feature high-end finishes, private terraces, dedicated parking bays, and sometimes even elevator access. They offer unparalleled prestige and space, appealing particularly to corporate executives and large joint families seeking a premium lifestyle near Golf Course Extension Road.

features.title: Furnished Residential Units
features.description: Targeting expatriates and busy professionals, furnished rental houses in Sector 67 provide immediate move-in readiness. These units come equipped with essential furniture, appliances, and sometimes even kitchenware, significantly reducing initial setup costs and time. Finding a perfectly furnished rental house streamlines the transition, offering maximum convenience and flexibility from day one of your lease agreement.

features.title: Semi-Furnished Family Homes
features.description: Offering a balance between cost and convenience, semi-furnished homes include basic essentials like air conditioners, geysers, and wardrobes but allow tenants to bring their personal furniture. Rent house in Sector 67 in this configuration gives you the flexibility to personalize the space while utilizing provided fixtures. This option is popular among renters planning a medium to long-term stay.

features.title: Gated Community Rentals
features.description: Many independent houses and villas in Sector 67 are part of smaller, exclusive gated communities. Renting within these communities guarantees enhanced security, usually with 24/7 manned gates and CCTV surveillance. Additionally, residents often gain access to communal amenities like parks and clubhouses, providing a safe and engaging environment ideal for raising children and enjoying an active social life.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Renting a House in Sector 67 Gurgaon
faqSection.description: Get instant answers to your key questions about lease terms, security deposits, and the best time to find a rental house in Sector 67.

faqs.question: What types of independent houses are typically available to rent house in Sector 67
faqs.answer: Sector 67 offers a broad inventory of independent housing, primarily focusing on builder floors and standalone villas or kothis. Builder floors are very popular, often configured as 2 BHK or 3 BHK units occupying a single floor in a building, offering privacy and separate access. Larger families often look for the 4 BHK and 5 BHK independent houses which usually feature private entrances, dedicated parking, servant quarters, and sometimes small gardens. The demand is particularly high for properties within smaller, well-maintained residential clusters and gated colonies offering enhanced security and shared amenities.

faqs.question: What is the average security deposit required for a rental house in Sector 67
faqs.answer: The standard security deposit for houses for rent in Sector 67 typically ranges between two to three months' equivalent of the monthly rent. This amount is refundable upon the satisfactory handover of the property at the end of the lease, provided there are no damages beyond normal wear and tear. It is crucial to clarify the exact amount and the conditions for refund in the rental agreement before finalizing the deal. Premium or fully furnished properties might sometimes require a slightly higher deposit, possibly up to four months' rent.

faqs.question: Is Sector 67 well-connected to major corporate offices in Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Absolutely, Sector 67 boasts outstanding connectivity crucial for corporate professionals. It is situated right off the Golf Course Extension Road, providing direct and easy access to major commercial hubs including Sector 55, Sector 56, and other parts of New Gurgaon. Furthermore, its proximity to the Southern Peripheral Road SPR links it swiftly to NH-48 and major business districts like Cyber City and Sohna Road, making the daily commute highly manageable. The area also benefits from excellent public transport links and easy access to the Rapid Metro line extensions.

faqs.question: Are there many fully furnished houses available to rent in Sector 67
faqs.answer: Yes, reflecting the large population of corporate transferees and expatriates, Sector 67 has a good supply of fully furnished rental houses, including builder floors and smaller villas. These properties come complete with high-quality furniture, modular kitchen appliances, air conditioning units, and often premium fittings. While fully furnished houses command a higher rental price compared to semi-furnished or unfurnished units, they offer significant convenience for immediate occupancy, minimizing the time and effort required for setup.

faqs.question: What are the standard lease durations for independent houses here
faqs.answer: The most common lease duration when you rent house in Sector 67 is 11 months, renewable thereafter. However, property owners generally prefer longer lock-in periods, particularly for high-value independent houses and villas. It is often possible to negotiate a 12-month or even a 24-month lease agreement, especially if you commit to a nominal rent escalation after the first year. Ensure your agreement clearly specifies notice periods and exit clauses for both parties.

faqs.question: Are independent houses in Sector 67 pet-friendly
faqs.answer: Pet policies vary significantly from one landlord to another, especially in independent house rentals. While some landlords are strictly against pets due to potential damage, many independent house owners in Sector 67 are more flexible than large apartment societies, particularly if the property has a private garden or terrace area. It is vital to discuss your pet requirements openly with the property owner or agent upfront, as disclosing this early can prevent lease complications later. Expect to pay a slightly higher security deposit if pets are permitted.

faqs.question: What kind of amenities can I expect when I rent house in Sector 67
faqs.answer: Renting an independent house in Sector 67 often means access to several key amenities. These frequently include 24/7 water supply, reliable power backup via inverters or generators, dedicated parking spaces, and sometimes private security personnel stationed at the entry points of smaller residential clusters. If you rent a house within a gated colony, you will also likely gain access to shared amenities like parks, children’s play areas, and sometimes a small community hall or clubhouse for social gatherings.

faqs.question: How is the maintenance handled for rental properties in Sector 67
faqs.answer: For independent builder floors or houses, external structural maintenance and common area upkeep (if applicable) are usually the responsibility of the landlord or the Resident Welfare Association RWA. Internal maintenance, general wear and tear, and immediate minor repairs like electrical faults or plumbing issues typically fall to the tenant. It is crucial for the rental agreement to explicitly detail which party is responsible for major appliance repairs and structural defects to avoid future disputes.

faqs.question: Is Sector 67 suitable for families with young children
faqs.answer: Sector 67 is highly favored by families because of its planned layout and excellent resources. The presence of numerous high-quality schools nearby, ample green spaces and parks, and enhanced security measures in many independent house clusters make it an ideal environment for raising children. The relatively lower traffic volume on internal sector roads compared to central Gurgaon also contributes to a safer and quieter neighborhood ambiance.

faqs.question: What are the typical processing fees involved when I secure a house for rent here
faqs.answer: When securing a rental house in Sector 67 through a real estate agent, the standard processing or brokerage fee is usually equivalent to one month's rent, paid once upon signing the lease agreement. Tenants must also budget for the security deposit and the first month’s advance rent. Ensure you also factor in utility connection fees for electricity and water meters, especially if moving into a newly constructed independent property.
